weap id [weapon]: 509 (Bane of Heresy)
damage [dmg]: 15 Fatigue
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
area of effect [aoe]: 1
 
(Armor Piercing [armorpiercing], Affects Sacreds Only [sacredonly], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5E to forge (E1)

The God-Slayer Spears have been forged by the Elder Cyclopses to help their allies get rid of the Gods. Pretender Gods can be tricky to hit and harm, but not with these spears. Any God standing even close to where the spear hits will be struck by a wave of fatigue and a few of these spear will soon put down even the mightiest Pretender. Sacred units will be equally affected by the fatigue.
